# TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.vertical

**Case**

The caption button view can tilt in the vertical direction.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertical
```

## Tilt Directions

- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.all**: The caption button view can tilt in all directions.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.horizontal**: The caption button view can tilt in the horzontal direction.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.none**: The caption button view can’t tilt.
